sect1.title: Subversion SSH Access (for editors)
sect1.para: For editors, access is slightly more complicated. You first of all need to generate yourself an ssh key-pair. You then need to upload your public key into your ~/.ssh directory on belgarath. To generate the keys run:

When prompted as to where to save them, it's probably best to leave them in .ssh (as id_dsa and id_dsa.pub) unless you already have ssh keys there. When prompted for a passphrase just press enter (unless you want to have to give the phrase every time you perform a cvs operation. Having generated your keys, upload ~/.ssh/id_dsa.pub to belgarath and move it to ~/.ssh/authorized_keys2 on belgarath. (Your local copy of id_dsa and id_dsa.pub should remain untouched by this.) Make sure that the ~/.ssh directory on belgarath is mode 700:
